text: Holger Czukay (,. Holger Schüring;. 24 March 1938 – 5 September 2017)Deutsche Rock-Ikone „Can“-Bassist Holger Czukay tot aufgefunden was a German musician. He was born in the Free City of Danzig . He was probably best known as a co- founder of the krautrock group Can. Czukay was also known for having created early important examples of ambient music, for having explored "world music" well before the term was coined, and for having been a pioneer of sampling. Czukay was found dead at his apartment in Weilerswist, Germany on 5 September 2017 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * A Holger Czukay interview (2004) * An interview with Czukay * Dignose Records Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German rock musicians Category:People from Gdańsk
title: Holger Czukay
